attributes.action: Supermarket Chains help those local to each of their stores see for more info
attributes.additional_details:
In supermarket giants this festive period i saw bread and mince pies fall in price as the day got near from £1.50 down to 19p for a loaf and 59p for a box of mince pies that 7 days previous were £1.19, 
Tesco's,Sainbury's,Morrison's give back to the communities that surround your supermarkets in the form of helping The Salvation Army , soup kitchens, food banks and hostels, give them your reduction items close sellbys etc,  you take so much from the communities its time to give back not greed
attributes.background: In supermarket giants this festive period i saw bread and mince pies fall in price as the day got near from £1.50 down to 19p for a loaf and 59p for a box of mince pies that 7 days previous were £1.19

rejection.details:
Your petition is asking supermarket chains to take action, not the Government or Parliament. 

You could raise this issue with supermarket chains directly via contact details available on their websites.
